experience.title: Investment Banking Analyst
experience.description: Nucleus Advisors is an Investment Banking and Risk Advisory Firm devised to help growing businesses. Nucleus works closely with SMEs, Startups, Unlisted and Listed entities.

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: Soonicorn Ventures is a SEBI-registered Alternative Investment Fund (AIF) having a fund size of 250Cr. SV is committed to empowering its members to invest in early-stage startups. The team also helps crucial deal-related processes, including Due Diligence, Valuation, Legal Documents and Portfolio management.SV team is formed of Investment Bankers and Analysts holding an extensive experience in managing buy side and sell side deals globally.Invest | Raise Funds | Network
